data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Gent get the game underway.
Smail Prevljak puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Eupen kick-off.
Jordan Botaka is replacing Anderson Niangbo for the away team.
In the minute 53, Goal! Jens Cools extends Eupen lead to 2-0 with a header.
Laurent Depoitre is on a sub for Niklas Dorsch for Gent.
Sven Kums keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 68, The home team replace Knowledge Musona with Julien Ngoy.
Eupen make their second substitution with Menno Koch replacing Smail Prevljak.
In the minute 74, Michael Ngadeu (Gent) is red-carded and dismissed.
Sven Kums (Gent) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Andreas Beck is on a sub for Adriano for Eupen.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Giorgi Chakvetadze with Dylan Mbayo.
Jens Cools (Eupen) has received a first yellow card.
Dino Arslanagic is booked for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
